Welcome!

About Us

McKenzie Music Studios got its start at a little cottage in Argyle Texas, ten years ago. Back then, the Studio was just an upright piano, a shelf of books, and a calendar in the corner of my tiny living room. Now, while I still teach from home, McKenzie Music Studios boasts its own special space, complete with baby grand piano, electronic keyboard, basic recording equipment, and a library of music. As a music teacher, I believe that the experience of learning a new instrument should be fun, challenging, and mind-opening. My students and I study music theory, usually through games at our theory table. We learn pieces that students express interest in, and grow dreams from the piano bench. And along the way, we learn a bit more about ourselves. Won't you join us? Click on the Private Lesson link to learn more! In Music Megan McKenzie
